Changelog.JustUpdatedMessage: 1. Offline mode 2. Faster player and app 3. Added YouTube as an mp3 provider 4. Improve database 5. Fix major and minor bugs 6. Reorder and delete playlist songs 7. Manually add songs to playlist or to queue 8. Settings and about page 9. Advertisements 10. Scrobble w/ Last.FM 11. Search supports last.fm song links 12. Update to third party libraries
